name: delimiter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something such as a mark or symbol used to show the beginning or end of separate elements in a text, computer program, etc.: This line of code uses the comma as a delimiter.
More examplesFewer examplesA space is probably always considered a word delimiter.Use the semicolon delimiter ( ; ) if multiple patterns are specified. The text file uses "tab" as a column delimiter.Columns in a row are separated by the delimiter character.
